name: isometric-fleet
description: Multiplayer isometric fleet with four humans, four MEW agents, and sharable navigation streams
author: MEW Protocol Team

variables.name: AGENT_API_KEY
variables.description: API key for AI copilots (optional - required if you want the MEW agents to plan routes)

variables.name: AGENT_MODEL
variables.description: Model to use for AI copilots

variables.name: AGENT_PROMPT
variables.default: You are a MEW fleet navigator responsible for guiding ships and teammates across an isometric ocean. Provide succinct status updates and request human confirmation before taking control of shared assets.
